Uses of Class
si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.PredictionConfidence

Packages that use PredictionConfidence
Package
Description
si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence
 
si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.classification
 
si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.regression
 

  • Uses of PredictionConfidence in si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence

    Subclasses of PredictionConfidence in si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    OracleScore
    Provides reliability scores on the basis of 'actual error', which is not attainable in practice, i.e., if true unlabeled data are used.
    class 
    RandomScore
    Returns random numbers as reliability scores, two modes are possible: RANDOM_UNIFORM: random numbers are generated uniformly in [0,1] RANDOM_GAUSSIAN: random numbers are normally distribution in [0,1] with mean 0.5 and std.

  • Uses of PredictionConfidence in si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.classification

    Subclasses of PredictionConfidence in si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.classification
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ClassesProbabilities
    Calculate the confidence of prediction for the multi-target classification as follows: For each target, get the max classification probability (i.e., majority) among possible class values.

  • Uses of PredictionConfidence in si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.regression

    Subclasses of PredictionConfidence in si.ijs.kt.clus.ext.semisupervised.confidence.regression
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    RForestProximities
    Class which determines reliability score of an unlabeled example e_u as follows: r(e_u) = sum_{e_l} w_l * oobError(e_l), where w_l is random forest proximity of e_u to labeled example e_l, and oonError return out-of-bag error of labeled example e_u.
    class 
    VarianceScore
    Calculates the confidence of predictions as standard deviation of votes of the trees in random forest tree ensemble.
